name: Omnium Handcannon
description: Launch **1** Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to **20** seconds. Cooldown: **50** seconds. Maximum **2** charges.

advancement.star1: Increase duration of energy pillars to **30** seconds.
advancement.star2: Increase endurance regen speed by 30% for **20** seconds after switching to the Omnium Handcannon.
advancement.star4: Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
